name: Super Impossible Wheel
description:
It seems so simple, stop the ball on the matching color, but this is Super Impossible Wheel! the wheel spins, the ball spins, the colors change and new color sections get added! It's pandemonium! It really is impossible, the best you can hope for is to make it out with your sanity.

Play the "hardest" game on mobile! The action doesn't end. It just gets harder and harder.

SUPER IMPOSSIBLE WHEEL

Key features:
• Endless action
• Vivid bold look and feel
• Easy to play, hard to play awesome
• quick pick up and play game style
• single finger tap and play
• score bonuses
• play on your Apple watch

ALREADY A FAN? Like Super Impossible Wheel on Facebook or follow them on Twitter for all the latest Super Impossible Wheel gossip.
